\dAnd then you just roll it up real quick and...\nTa-da!\d%K%P
Kaede deftly worked the pan and chopsticks to roll\nup the eggs.%K%P
\dYou're better at this than you look...\d%K%P
\dPardon me for having the looks of a failed cook, I\nguess.\d%K%P
Not to back up Yukari or anything, but Kaede really\ndidn't look like the type to be good in the\nkitchen.%K%P
She still had that mischievous look about her from\nher Tatarigami days.%K%P
\dShe's more domesticated than you'd think.\d%K%P
\dAnd especially good at cooking. Better than my\nmom.\d%K%P
\dN-Now, I wouldn't go that far.\d%K%P
We might have made her blush, but her hands never\nfaltered.%K%P
The way she so expertly handled herself while\ncooking really made her seem like perfect wife\nmaterial.%K%P
\dI can cook too, you know!\d%K%P
\dLet's see what you've got, then. Can you fix\nsomething up for me?\d%K%P
\dHehehe, I'll fix up anything that you may\ndesire.\d%K%P
\dHow about you, Shion? Wanna help?\d%K%P
\dNah, I'll pass. I'd just be in the way.\d%K%P
Shion and I left the kitchen so we wouldn't bother\nthem.%K%P
\dNow then, while the cat's away the mice will do,\nwell, whatever they do.\d%K%P
Shion went around unpacking gleefully, setting up\nher stuff just the way she liked.%K%P
\dDon't mind me. Just go relax or something.\d%K%P
\dSounds good to me.\d%K%P
Part of me worried about leaving Shion\nunsupervised, but I did as she suggested.%K%P
A few minutes later...%K%P
Shion had finished and was all settled in.%K%P
\dMmm, these chips are amazing!\d%K%P
She somehow managed to use her laptop and eat\nchips while simultaneously flipping through the\ncomic she was reading.%K%P
\dI was worried the flooring would be too hard, but\nwith this rug rolled out it's not half bad.\d%K%P
\dI wasn't sure if I'd be comfortable out here, but\nit's pretty much as good as our old place.\d%K%P
\dYou've sure made yourself at home. Won't Kaede\nget mad at you for lazing around?\d%K%P
\dNah, no worries. I know how to handle her.\d%K%P
That much was true. She did seem to have gotten\naway with the mess in her old room.%K%P
Kaede had probably grown tired of asking her to\nclean up again and again.%K%P
\dWe're gonna be eating soon though, so you might\nwant to hold back on those chips.\d%K%P
\dListen to you. This is Kaede's cooking we're\ntalking about.\d%K%P
\dIt'll be all bland and boring and bleh.\d%K%P
\dYou think so? I'd say her meals are always full of\nflavor. Just the kind of stuff I like.\d%K%P
\dWait, seriously? She never cooks like that for me,\nyou know!\d%K%P
\dShe probably just tries to cook balanced meals for\nyou. Making up for the oils and salt you get from\nall that junk you eat.\d%K%P
\dHuh... She might have said as much before.\d%K%P
\dYou should listen to her, you know.\d%K%P
\dYeah, yeah.\d%K%P
She declined to heed my advice.%K%P
Probably the same way she ignored Kaede.%K%P
\dOh baby, there we go!\d%K%P
\dThere what goes?\d%K%P
\dMy stocks! They're shooting up and up!\d%K%P
\dWait, you've been buying stocks?\d%K%P
\dSurprised a Goddess of Misfortune would? It's\nfine! My powers can't travel all the way out to the\nstock exchange.\d%K%P
\dI thought since I trouble everyone on a local\nscale I might try and pay them back working on a\nglobal one.\d%K%P
\dI'll build up some wealth with these, and give it\nback to the people of Kamimori. Then maybe they'll\nlet me stay...\d%K%P
Shion used to be so afraid of her powers that she\nabsolutely refused to come in contact with anyone.%K%P
But not anymore.%K%P
Realizing she couldn't stop her powers, she tried\nto balance them out in other ways.%K%P
\dWoo boy, after-hours trading is amazing.\d%K%P
\dJust look at my capital, going up every second! At\nthis rate I could buy up all of Kamimori!\d%K%P
\dWait, really...?\d%K%P
\dMaybe someday, yeah. Gotta keep at it.\d%K%P
She always seemed so spacey, but she actually was\nplanning ahead.%K%P
\dWahoo! Look at how this virtual currency is\nblowing up! Can't beat that!\d%K%P
Maybe she wasn't looking all that far ahead.%K%P
I had a feeling she was enjoying herself a little\ntoo much.%K%P
\dOkay, I get it, you're excited. But could you stop\nflailing your legs around like that?\d%K%P
\dWhat? Why?\d%K%P
\dI can see your, you know...\d%K%P
Whenever she kicked around, I could see her\npanties under her skirt.%K%P
The contrast between her underwear and her\nwell-shaped legs caught my eyes.%K%P
\dI didn't forget to put on my underwear, did I?\d%K%P
\dYou're wearing some, don't worry. Wait...you\nforget to wear underwear sometimes?\d%K%P
\dAhaha...\d%K%P
Trying to just laugh it off, was she?%K%P
\dDon't worry. I won't forget while I'm here.\d%K%P
\dI'd prefer if you didn't forget ever.\d%K%P
\dYeah yeah.\d%K%P
She started drifting off back into her own world.%K%P
And though I had just asked her to stop, she\nstarted kicking her legs around again.%K%P
\dHey, Aki...\d%K%P
\dYou know you can look if you want to, right?\d%K%P
\dWh-What are you getting at?\d%K%P
\dTeeheehee! If you're enjoying it, by all means\nbe my guest.\d%K%P
\dI mean, I am your mistress, right? I can't beat\nthe boobies on those other two, so all I've got to\ngo with is my butt!\d%K%P
\dSo yeah, how about it? Wanna get in there and\ngrab a piece?\d%K%P
\dDon't go getting rash now, Shion. Do you seriously\nthink we could get away with that here?\d%K%P
\dFine, fine. Just have a looksee, then.\d%K%P
With that she went back to her business.%K%P
And waggling her legs around as if I wasn't even\nthere.%K%P
\dGaaah...\d%K%P
She did have a nice butt.%K%P
And while she might have been self-conscious about\nher looks, she definitely had her own charm.%K%P
\dSorry, but you really need to stop.\d%K%P
\dC'mon, why?\d%K%P
\dI can't take it anymore. I think you're\nunderestimating how good you look.\d%K%P
\dWait, what? Are you saying...?\d%K%P
\dJust stop right there. Not another word.\d%K%P
\dL-Look who's talking!\d%K%P
\dDon't toy with my poor little heart like that!\d%K%P
She didn't stop moving her legs, but she started\ndoing so a little more modestly.%K%P
That reaction was just another part of her charm.%K%P
Not that she seemed to be aware of it herself.%K%P
